channel.title: Sometimes pc gets glitched

item.title: Sometimes pc gets glitched
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Because Delta_ is an idiot and made Pest Control get reset for all players, instead of making it reset once. Therefore, when you kill a portal, it only takes back one person and resets it. The rest are left to know that the portals are then remaining and you’ll only make it back one-by-one.

The way to fix it is to make pest control reset in the PlayerHandler class, instead of the client class.

Read full topic

item.title: Sometimes pc gets glitched
item.dc:creator: @2killsami 2killsami
item.description:
@2killsami wrote:

Hi, on my server sometimes when you kill all portals it doesnt take u back to outside of boat…you get stuck

heres code

if(PlayerHandler.portal1 && PlayerHandler.portal2 && PlayerHandler.portal3 && PlayerHandler.portal4 && inGame){ inGame = false; resetpc(); pcPoints += 5; toX = 2657; toY = 2639; PlayerHandler.pcWaitTimer = 300; playerLevel[0] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]); playerLevel[1] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[1]); playerLevel[2] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]); playerLevel[4] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[4]); playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]); playerLevel[6] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[6]); sM("You have defeated pest control! You now have "+pcPoints+" points!"); ResetAttackNPC(); refreshSkills(); }

Read full topic
